page.title: 13MUGDOCK WOODS
page.content: Mugdock Woods is part of the Country Park.On the afternoon I visited them it was hot and the woods were beautiful and cool.I went along by the River Allander and there were two kinds of trees,oak and birch.They were just budding.We listened and we heard different things.There was the noise of the water and the birds singing sweetly and the bumble bees buzzing around our heads. The paths went up and down.We sat among the sweet smelling bluebells.It looked as though there was carpet after carpet of them.There was a golf course opposite us .It was a hot day and we enjoyed the scenery very much.Mugdock woods is a lovely place to be.
